question:
Your neighbours have a dog that is noisy at night. You can’t sleep. Write a letter to your neighbours. In your letter:
Describe the problem with the dog.
Explain why it is important for you to sleep
Outline what your neighbours could do about the situation.
text: Greetings of the day! I am writing this letter to tell you about the issue faced by me because of the noisy behaviour of your dog at night.

The American bully dog that you purchased last Sunday has been creating a lot of noise since the very first night. It started barking from 1 AM to 4 AM daily which is causing me sleeplessness and I got a severe headache due to this. Moreover, as I am a construction supervisor, I require a sound sleep at night to make myself able to work properly with machines. However, your dog’s high intensity barking noise is totally absurd for my health.

Therefore, I want you to shift the dog house to some other area of your house or call an animal doctor for a checkup to find out the reason behind its noisy nature. A legal discourse would be followed against you if you do not try to solve this problem timely. I hope you would consider the genuinity of my situation and act accordingly.
I look forward to hearing from you soon in this regard.

error_list.error_des: The abbreviated title Mr. seems to be punctuated incorrectly. Consider changing the punctuation.
It appears that high intensity is missing a hyphen. Consider adding the hyphen(s).
